text: right right The Mystic Ark is a painting by Hugh of Saint Victor (ca. 1096–1141). ==References== ==External links== * http://mysticark.ucr.edu/ - a detailed collection of the same illustrations published in The Mystic Ark: Hugh of Saint Victor, Art, and Thought in the Twelfth Century. Category:12th- century manuscripts Category:12th-century paintings
title: The Mystic Ark
